name: Junction Games Suite
description:
Have a blast playing through many games from the Early Days of Junction Games. This Suite of 16 small games will hopefully show you how a solo developer such as myself was able to grow over the first 4 years of game development. These were all made anywhere from 2011-2014 when I was 14-17.  It's obvious how many bugs and other game design quirks that don't make any sense, but these games taught me a lot about how to complete a game. Albeit very small games that aren't very good, but games nonetheless. 

P.S. Don't worry about Galactic Fighters 4 The Before Episode 1. It's just absolutely awful. Play it on easy and get it over with if you really want to know the badly put together story.
